courseDetails.title: Master Course in Social Entrepreneurship 2.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Social Work, Social Entrepreneurship, Business Entrepreneurship, Non-profit Business, Free Entrepreneurship, Startup
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master course in social entrepreneurship 2.0, The term social entrepreneurship 2.0 refers to the organization of a business around a social or environmental cause, including nonprofits and charities as well as for-profits.

Unlike traditional entrepreneurs, social entrepreneurs want to make a difference in the world. Often, they have a personal connection to the causes they support, which inspires the mission of their businesses.

In traditional businesses, success might be measured by market share or revenue growth year-over-year, but social entrepreneurs focus more on what they're doing right, like creating jobs, planting trees, or giving to charities that solve the problem they're solving.

From product development to branding, from supply chain management to financial planning, social enterprises have a core mission that influences how they're managed.

Most social enterprises measure success using a triple bottom line instead of just earnings:

· Whether your business is designed to make a difference in people's lives, improve lives, and develop a community in a sustainable way.

· Your environmental impact—how you help create a sustainable planet or reduce your carbon footprint (CO2 emissions).

· The goal of a social enterprise is to make money so that it can be sustainable, pay workers, and grow.

The profits of a social enterprise are allocated to creating positive change in the world, as opposed than reinvesting them in the business.

There's a big difference between social enterprises and corporate social responsibility (CSR). "Doing good" isn't something you add to your business model. It's what you value most.

In this master course you can learn the 5 Major topics,

1. Introduction, characteristics and types of Social entrepreneurship 2.0

2. Major skills are important in social entrepreneurship

3. Key concepts and Major challenge of social entrepreneurship

4. Social entrepreneurship career opportunities

5. Social innovation and social entrepreneurship
targetAudiences: All UG, PG , Business Students, Startup mentors, Non Profit Business Persons, Entrepreneurs and business seekers, Interested learners

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Business Branding and Brand Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Business Branding, Brand Management, Branding Strategy, Branding Techniques, Global Branding, Brand Ambassador
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master course in business branding and brand management : In the past, branding was largely defined by giving a company a particular design or symbol in order to advertise its products and services.

The aesthetic component of branding: visual identity is misunderstood (and still is). It's still just about logos, design, packaging, etc., for many, whether they're specialists or not. In addition, even high-level marketers continue to preach the same old vision of branding, even though the concept and its understanding have evolved so much.

Not only does branding make a memorable impression on consumers, but it also lets your clients and customers know what to expect. This helps you stand out from your competition and explains what makes you the smart choice. Creating a brand that represents who you are as a company, and how you want to be perceived, is imperative.

Developing a brand involves many things, such as advertising, customer service, social responsibility, reputation, and visuals. Combined, these elements (and more) make one unique and (hopefully) eye-catching profile.

Brand Management : Your brand is managed and crafted through the brand management process. Brand definition, positioning, and delivery of brand value are integrated into this process. Customers are more likely to stick with your business if you have a well-planned brand management plan.

In this master course you can learn the 5 Major topics,

1. Introduction of Business branding and brand management

2. Business branding strategy and the value of creation

3. International business branding strategy and global branding

4. Brand management techniques

5. How to become a brand ambassador or brand manager/strategist
targetAudiences: All UG and PG Business and Management students, Marketing managers, Digital marketers, Business Executives, Marketing executives

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Interviewing Skills and Career Development
courseDetails.shortDescription: Job Search, Resume and CV Writing, LinkedIn, Career Development, Recruiting, Coding Interview
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master course in Interviewing skills and Career development: A number of businesses have turned to difficult job interviews to find the right candidate for their openings, such as Google's. Businesses use a variety of techniques to hire the right candidates, including brain teasers, group interviews and behavioral questions.

To hire the most qualified candidates, human resource professionals and hiring managers should understand how to conduct an effective interview. It is a crucial part of the hiring process. It provides an overview of structured and unstructured interviewing methods.

We discuss both structured and unstructured methods of interviewing in this lecture. It discusses the most commonly used types of interviewing—telephone prescreens, one-on-one interviews, and panel interviews—as well as behavioral, competency-based, and situational interviews. During employment interviews, employers must understand that certain types of questions are prohibited by federal and state law.

The Five P's of Career Management can help you gain more control and oversight over your own career management. The Five P's correspond to: Possibility, Presence, People, Perspective, and Perseverance

Get ready for your next job interview by practicing these six essential interview skills.

During the job interview, clarify interview questions.

During the job interview, speak out loud.

During the interview, communicate nonverbally.

Before you set foot on an interview, make sure you are familiar with your resume in depth.

Your job interview should include a compelling story.

In this master course you can learn the 5 Major topics and learning about the Job Search, Resume and CV Writing, LinkedIn, Career Development, Recruiting, Coding Interview.

1. Introduction of Interview, types of Interview skills and areas of career development

2. Why is Interview skills important?

3. Interviewing skills for Non profit organization and Interview tips for students

4. Methods of Interviewing and Good Interview Techniques

5. Career development skills and why is it important?
targetAudiences: All UG, PG Business students, HR, Executives, Job Seekers, Career Path Seekers, Job Searchers and Job Designers

Im letzten Teil dieses Kurses geht es um Themes, die Ihre Webseite professionell aussehen lassen und ihr das gewünschte Design verleihen. Sie werden auch lernen, wie Sie Ihre eigenen Themes erstellen können.


Warum diesen Kurs wählen?

Außerdem können Sie einem WordPress-Experten über die Schulter schauen, da er Ihnen zeigt, wie Sie eine WordPress-Website erstellen. Am Ende dieses Kurses werden Sie eine Website haben, auf die Sie wirklich stolz sein können.

Keine Programmiererfahrung erforderlich: Dieses WordPress-Tutorial für Anfänger ist eine fantastische Ressource für die Erstellung Ihrer eigenen Website - ohne Programmierkenntnisse. Diese Anleitung ist perfekt für Sie, wenn Sie keine Vorkenntnisse in HTML, CSS, JavaScript oder PHP haben und einen schönen Blog mit minimalem Aufwand erstellen möchten.


Das ultimative WordPress-Tutorial für Einsteiger!

Wenn Sie sich für das Bloggen interessieren, aber von der übermäßigen Komplexität eingeschüchtert sind, ist dies die perfekte Lösung. Alles, was Sie brauchen, ist ein Computer mit Internetanschluss und ein Browser. Sie müssen keine Programmierkenntnisse haben.

Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

Le cours vous aidera à assurer votre confiance dans la gestion de base de données MySQL en vous montrant comment optimiser les performances et les requêtes pour votre base de données. Ce cours améliorera vos compétences car il a une bonne applicabilité dans le monde de la technologie, ce qui peut différencier votre travail de la concurrence.

Les progrès rapides dans le monde de la technologie peuvent également être decourageant pour quiconque souhaitant entrer dans le domaine de la technologie des bases de données, mais ce cours, vous fournissant instructions et explications étape par étape, sera un garde et une lumière au bout du tunnel pour vous.

Apprenez en plus sur la façon d'ajouter des fonctionnalités et des commandes à l'environnement MySQL pour créer une meilleure cohérence des données et une sécurité suffisante pour répondre à toutes les responsabilités de tout gestionnaire de données.

Vous apprendrez également des techniques et des méthodes spécifiques qui peuvent être utilisées pour maintenir les bases de données, afin de les garder sécurisées, bien organisées et rapides.


Le MySQL ultime pour les débutants

courseDetails.title: Excel VBA pour débutants: Formation pas à pas sur Excel VBA

courseDetails.longDescription:
VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. VBA Excel permet de gagner du temps en terminant la même action sur plusieurs classeurs Excel, ce qui vous fait gagner beaucoup de temps grâce à une action automatisée.

Il est conçu pour les débutants : ce cours est un guide étape par étape pour une compréhension facile pour les personnes qui n'ont aucune connaissance de ce qu'est VBA mais qui ont des connaissances sur Excel.
targetAudiences: Ce programme VBA Excel est destiné aux débutants sans connaissances préalables sur VBA

Master Course in Food & Courier: Collection Job, Delivery Job & Feedback

In the fast-paced world we live in, convenience is key. With the rise of online food delivery services, the food and courier industry has witnessed a significant transformation. Today, we will explore the different aspects of this industry, focusing on collection jobs, delivery jobs, and the importance of customer feedback.

The collection job plays a crucial role in the food and courier industry. It involves picking up orders from restaurants or food outlets and ensuring they are ready for delivery. Timeliness and efficiency are paramount in this role, as any delays can negatively impact the customer's experience.

Once the orders are collected, the delivery job takes center stage. Delivery personnel are responsible for transporting the orders from the restaurant or food outlet to the customer's location. This role requires individuals to be well-versed in navigation, as they must find the most efficient routes to ensure timely deliveries.

Customer feedback is invaluable in the food and courier industry. It provides valuable insights into the overall customer experience, allowing companies to identify areas for improvement.

The food and courier industry has revolutionized the way we enjoy our meals. Collection jobs and delivery jobs are the backbone of this industry, ensuring that orders reach customers promptly and efficiently. Furthermore, customer feedback plays a vital role in shaping and improving the services provided. As the industry continues to evolve, it is crucial for companies to adapt and embrace customer feedback to deliver the best possible experience.

courseDetails.longDescription: There’s a HUGE difference between simply operating a used car dealership business and operating a profitable used car dealership. To get a better idea of the possible demand for used cars in your area, you’ll need to crunch some numbers. By knowing the number of used cars sold in your area every year and month , you can estimate what percentage of the market you will be likely to be able to corner and reach. By locating the average profit per vehicle, you can get an approximate idea of how much profit and money your dealership able to make per year. While the groundwork associated with opening a dealership can be time-consuming, expensive, and demanding, the real test of your dealership’s viability doesn’t begin until after you open your doors to the public. Without the right management of your dealership, all the effort you put into laying the foundation will be wasted. While each state has its own rules and regulations, there are several important universal aspects of operating a car dealership and tips on how you can get the most out of your investment. Your customers are the single most important factor in the success or failure of your business, so taking the time to identify who they are and what they care about is absolutely vital. Take a look at the types of cars you plan on selling, then do some research to determine the age, gender, and income level of the average individual who owns those types of vehicles. Later down the line, this will allow you to tailor your marketing and advertising efforts toward those who are most likely to be interested in what you have to offer. Make sure to base any of your conclusions regarding your target clients on real actionable data; don’t simply make assumptions.

courseDetails.title: Print on Demand 2023: From Zero to Profitable Business
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Print-on-Demand: Learn Niche Research, Store Setup, Design, Marketing Strategies, and Launch E-Commerce Business
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to this comprehensive course on launching and managing a successful print-on-demand e-commerce store using Launch Cart and Printful.


In this course, we will guide you through the entire process of setting up your online store from scratch, starting from niche research and selection, creating a business name, registering a domain, designing a logo and landing pages, all the way through to managing your products and marketing your store.


Section 1: Overview

We will start with a brief overview of what's inside this course, followed by an in-depth explanation of how print-on-demand works and why Launch Cart is the best platform to use for your e-commerce store. You will learn about the expectations and profit potential of print-on-demand, and why it is a smart choice for anyone looking to start an online business.


Section 2: Getting Started

Next, we will dive into the initial steps of creating your store. We will cover niche research and selection, and guide you through the process of finding a business name that resonates with your brand. We will also provide you with tips on how to conduct domain name research and registration, and show you how to create an attractive logo and designs that capture the essence of your brand.


Section 3: Setting Up Store

Once you have your branding in place, we will show you how to set up your store using Launch Cart. We will guide you through the process of signing up and provide an overview of the Launch Cart dashboard. You will learn how to connect Printful with Launch Cart, set up Printful settings, and create custom pages, landing/sales pages, and store themes. You will also learn how to customize checkout pages and menus, connect a custom domain to your store, and set up shipping and taxes. We will also show you how to boost your conversion rates using abandoned carts and how to make admin customizations.


Section 4: Store Management

Now that your store is set up, we will show you how to manage it effectively. You will learn how to add new products, including adding products from Printful, managing sales and coupons, managing customers and reviews, managing inventory, and even managing multiple stores. We will also show you how to offer bumper offers and upsells to your customers to maximize your profits.


Section 5: Product Design

Product design is a critical aspect of your print-on-demand store, and in this section, we will guide you through the process of designing your products. We will show you how to purchase designs, use Canva for designing, and even design using AI.


Section 6: Paid Marketing Strategies

In this section, we will dive into the different paid marketing strategies that you can use to drive traffic and sales to your store. You will learn about paid ads, the best ad strategy, influencer marketing, and creating video ads and mockups.


Section 7: Free Traffic Sources

Free traffic sources can be just as effective as paid marketing, and we will show you how to take advantage of them. We will cover the use of coupons and sales, affiliate marketing, Pinterest, live streams, email marketing, list building, Quora and Reddit, and even Tiktok, Shorts, and Reels.



By the end of this course, you will have a fully functional, profitable print-on-demand eCommerce store, with the knowledge and skills to manage and market it effectively. Join us now and start your journey to success in the online business world!

Beginners with no prior knowledge or experience in print-on-demand or e-commerce.

STAAD Pro stands for Structural Analysis and design. STAAD Pro v8i Software is widely used in analyzing and designing structures – buildings, bridges, towers, transportation, industrial and utility structures. In this Software you will show a detail analysis and design of all the structural elements of steel warehouse building under gravity loads (dead and live) and lateral loads (earthquake and wind)

courseDetails.title: The Concept of  Waste
courseDetails.shortDescription: Reduce waste and streamline value flow
courseDetails.longDescription:
Companies are always looking for new ways to improve business efficiency and increase quality. To run a business at optimal capacity, you need to reduce or eliminate waste from processes and improve production flow. In this course, you'll learn about Lean strategies to reduce waste by determining which operations add value and which don't. You'll explore the concept of continuous flow, and discover how to balance work processes to make production flow more efficient. You'll define what waste is, where it exists, and what causes it. You'll also examine aspects of Muda, continuous flow, line balancing, value and non-value-add, and practical Lean techniques for improving Operations Management.

What is waste in Lean Manufacturing?

A core principle in lean methodology is the removal of waste within an operation. And in any business, one of the heaviest drains on profitability is waste. Lean waste can come in the form of time, material, and labor. But it may also be related to the utilization of skill-sets as well as poor planning. In lean manufacturing, waste is any expense or effort that is expended but which does not transform raw materials into an item the customer is willing to pay for. By optimizing process steps and eliminating waste, the only true value is added at each phase of production.

Today, the Lean Manufacturing model recognizes 8 types of waste within an operation; seven originally conceived when the Toyota Production System was first conceived, and an eighth added when the lean methodology was adopted within the Western World. Seven of the eight wastes are production process-oriented, while the eighth waste is directly related to management’s ability to utilize personnel.

WHAT YOU WILL LEARN to

  1. classify production activities as a value-add, non-value-add, or necessary non-value-add.

  2. identify strategies for eliminating waste caused by overproduction and inventory.

  3. identify strategies for eliminating motion, waiting, and transportation waste.

  4. identify elimination strategies for waste caused by overprocessing and defects

  5. match cycle time and takt time to their descriptions

  6. identify the final three steps for balancing a production line
targetAudiences: Any professional, who is seeking career growth in the quality management sector

Managers, Supervisors, Team Leaders, CEO, and Senior Managers, who want to encourage continuous improvement for an organisation and responsible for developing lean thinking, practical skills, measurement of production staff, and analysing the performance of the employee in the workplace.
Individuals involved in a continuous improvement project who needs a complete overview of the process

courseDetails.title: Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality & Teaching Delivery 3.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality, Teacher Training, Teaching Delivery, Pedagogy, Teaching Online, Adult Education
courseDetails.longDescription:
Teaching Methods, Teaching Quality & Teaching Delivery 3.0

This course aims to equip aspiring educators with the fundamental principles and practical strategies necessary to excel in teaching. Participants will explore various teaching methods, analyze factors that contribute to teaching quality, and develop effective teaching delivery techniques. Through a combination of theory, hands-on activities, and real-world examples, learners will gain the knowledge and skills required to become effective and impactful educators.

Teaching is a noble art that plays a pivotal role in shaping the minds of future generations. The journey of education begins with understanding the foundation of teaching and learning. Teachers must familiarize themselves with various teaching methods and pedagogies to create an enriching and stimulating learning environment for their students.

To start, let's explore the diverse range of teaching methods and pedagogies available. From traditional lectures and discussions to more interactive approaches like group work, project-based learning, and flipped classrooms, each method serves unique purposes and caters to different learning styles. Understanding these options allows teachers to tailor their lessons effectively.

Learning Objectives for Teaching Methods:

  1. Understand the various teaching methods and their characteristics, such as lecture-based, interactive, experiential, and online teaching approaches.

  2. Identify the strengths and weaknesses of different teaching methods in different educational contexts.

  3. Learn how to select appropriate teaching methods based on the learning objectives, content, and the needs of diverse learners.

  4. Apply effective teaching methods to engage students actively in the learning process and enhance their understanding of the subject matter.

  5. Demonstrate the ability to adapt and modify teaching methods based on student feedback and learning outcomes.

  6. Evaluate the impact of different teaching methods on student performance and motivation.

Learning Objectives for Teaching Quality:

  1. Define and recognize the key components of teaching quality, including content expertise, pedagogical knowledge, communication skills, and classroom management.

  2. Identify the characteristics of a positive and inclusive learning environment that promotes student engagement, respect, and academic growth.

  3. Assess and implement strategies to maintain high standards of teaching and continually improve instructional practices.

  4. Learn to provide constructive feedback and support to students to foster their academic and personal development.

  5. Understand the importance of ongoing professional development to enhance teaching quality and keep up with best practices in education.

  6. Demonstrate the ability to self-reflect on teaching practices and use student feedback to refine instructional methods.

Learning Objectives for Teaching Delivery:

  1. Develop effective communication skills to deliver course content clearly and engagingly.

  2. Master the use of multimedia tools and technology to enhance teaching delivery and support student learning.

  3. Learn how to manage time efficiently during lessons and maintain a proper pace to cover course material effectively.

  4. Demonstrate the ability to adapt teaching delivery to accommodate diverse learning styles and student needs.

  5. Understand the role of active learning techniques in promoting student participation and understanding.

  6. Explore methods to encourage student interaction and facilitate productive discussions during lectures and class activities.

By achieving these learning objectives, educators can become more proficient in employing various teaching methods, ensuring high-quality teaching practices, and delivering engaging and effective lessons, leading to better student outcomes and a more enriching learning experience.

As educators, our mission is to empower students to become lifelong learners, critical thinkers, and active contributors to society. By understanding the fundamentals of teaching and learning, adapting to diverse learners, engaging and motivating students, utilizing effective teaching techniques, integrating technology thoughtfully, and mastering classroom and time management, we can unlock the true potential of education. Let us embark on this transformative journey together, embracing the art of effective teaching to shape a brighter future for generations to come.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:

1: Introduction to Teaching and Learning, Teaching Methods and Pedagogies

2: Adapting Teaching Methods to Diverse Learners & Assessing Learning Outcomes

3: Enhancing Teaching Quality & Engaging and Motivating Students

4: Effective Teaching Delivery Techniques & Technology Integration in Teaching

5: Classroom Management and Time Management & Evaluation and Improvement of Teaching

  • How to develop a growth mindset;

Block 2:

  • Understanding our learning styles;

  • Turning failures into worthwhile learnings;

  • Building self-esteem naturally.

It is brought to you by Dr. Jeff Leinaweaver and Rogier Rijnja. Dr. Leinaweaver is an experienced education and human resource professional. Dr. Jeff has been teaching in West Coast business schools on sustainability and is currently a senior organizational development leader with the University of Washington. With some reference to relevant research, Dr. Jeff offers practical and hands-on advice on how to develop a growth mindset with self or others.  He shares the difference between a fixed mindset and a growth mindset to start with. Many if us often don't even realize we are working with a  fixed mindset. Recognizing that you are stuck with a fixed mindset is what it all starts with. Similarly, it's good to know if you are equipped with a growth mindset right there.

Having  a growth mindset is a key differentiator for successful careers and happy lives. It's similar to the glass being half full versus being half empty, but there's more to it. Dr. Jeff leads you through your personal discovery and planning. 

Rogier Rijnja is an experienced human resources professional. He has worked and lived in the US, UK, France and The Netherlands. His work experience reaches across all continents with leading roles at renowned companies which include Amazon, Apple, Nike, Group Danone, Sara Lee and others. He is currently coaching individuals in leadership roles and advices companies on change, culture and reward.

Rogier will take you through the beauty of setbacks and how pivotal they are in growing your career and growing as an individual. The program will take a look at learning styles, turning failures into learnings that are worthwhile and the importance of self-esteem and how you get a grip on it.

Enjoy the course!.

courseDetails.title: SwiftUI iOS 16 Crash Course : Emoji Quote App in SwiftUI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Direct, no nonsense approach to iOS 16 Mobile Development with SwiftUI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to iOS Development using SwiftUI. This is a crash course so let's keep it short and sweet.


The goal of this course is to cover as many features as possible in iOS 16 development programming using SwiftUI and the Swift programming language. This is a crash course with a no b.s. approach.


After covering quite a lot of basics of SwiftUI (Stacks, Forms, Lists, ForEach, Buttons, Sliders, Pickers, Color Pickers, Scroll Views, Sheets, state, binding, animations, etc) we move on to the main app.


Roughly speaking this app has a blinking emoji with a speech bubble next to it (similar in style to Duolingo) and in the speech bubble a quote of the day appears. We learn how to grab a random quote from the internet. We are given a list of images with the quote inside. We can edit the text color, the text size, image size. We can save this quoted image to our photo album or share it using a share link.


Here is a list of the topics we will cover and the Apps we will create.

  1. Basics. We begin with a very brief introduction to Text, modifiers, HStack, VStack, ZStack, state variables, animations, onAppear.

  2. Beyond the basics. We cover slightly more advanced basics such as ForEach views, sheets, pickers, sliders, toggle switches, scroll views, buttons, etc.

  3. The Main App. Henceforth we delve onto the main app.

    1. App Icon. We learn how to create an App icon based on pexels and figma.

    2. SVG to PNG. We disassemble a SVG image and convert to PNG using figma. In other words we take an SVG image of an emoji and separate the eyes from the rest of the image. That way at a later stage in the course we can animate the eyes as if they are blinking from time to time.

    3. Speech Bubble Shape. We use Shape and Path to create a speech bubble. Moreover, we learn how to add text to the speech bubble.

    4. Light and Dark mode. We learn how to create a color palette that will support light and dark mode. Moreover, this is easily customizable. If you decided you prefer a different color scheme then the necessary changes are minimal.

    5. Quote Model. We create a model of a quote based on a free quote API that we will be using in the course.

    6. Quote View Model. This is part of the MVVM (Model, View-Model, View design pattern) which works naturally with SwiftUI. The View-Model can be roughly thought of as the glue connecting the view that we see an interact with and the model behind the scenes that models our data.

    7. Emoji Ninja. At this point when we tap on the emoji a new quote is generated and in addition if we use a long press gesture on the quote then the quote is copied to the clipboard using a context menu.

    8. Grid images. We create a grid of images. The number of columns depend on using an iPad or iPhone. Throughout the project we address adapting to both the iPhone and iPad.

    9. Share Images View. We create a share sheet where we can customize the image and quote. For instance we can change the text color and size and we can also change the image size and share the image or save the image as a picture.

    10. Offline quote.  The quote API we are using is free, however the API does have an undefined restriction on how many quotes we can use daily. In case we exceed the limit then we create a function that randomly creates a quote based on an internal list of quotes.

    11. Testing the App. We run the App and test out the features. It is worthwhile to test the App on a real device and not just on the simulator.


We cover an impressive amount of material in a very short time span. Hence a crash course in SwiftUI and iOS Development.


Like all of my courses this course is dynamic and I will be adding content regularly. However the goal of the course is to have a succinct, terse yet fairly comprehensive taste of SwiftUI and iOS 16 Development. So I will keep the general flavor of the course, that is, to be direct and to the point.


I hope you enjoy this course as much as I enjoyed creating it. Also make the code your own. Experiment and be creative. Try to implement an App idea of your own using what you've learned from this course.


I am always available for questions and am highly responsive. I check the Q & A and direct messages twice a day.


Happy programming, have a Great day and I enjoy your programming journey !


Ron
targetAudiences: Beginner-advanced programmers or anyone wanting to learn to program iOS 15 and iOS 16 using SwiftUI
Anyone who wants a quick overview of what can be done in SwiftUI

Overview:

This is a completed course explaining all the things about MicroC PRO for PIC Microcontroller... starting from downloading and Installing the software, General overview for the software, then explaining the main tools which can help us to be familiar with the software.

Then going to the examples which are the best way to deliver the different ideas to you.

And our practical section will be the Proteus professional program …. will help us to test our software in the Microcontroller with its components.


What is a MikroC PRO for PIC?

MikroC Pro is an Embedded-C compiler that allows you to convert a code written in C language to machine language. MikroC Pro for Pic is used for pic microcontroller programming in c. Before learning how to program pic microcontroller in c, let first get the basic introduction on microcontrollers and pic microcontrollers. After that you will be easily able to understand pic microcontroller programming.


What is a PIC Microcontroller?

The PIC Microcontrollers is a small computer in a single integrated circuit containing a processor core, memory and programmable I/O peripherals. Program memory in the form of NOR flash is also often included on chip, as well as a typical small amount of RAM. PIC Microcontrollers are designed for embedded applications in contrast to the microprocessors used in personal computers or other general purpose applications.

courseDetails.title: Building Cryptocurrency Price Tracker Website with Wordpress
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to build and design cryptocurrency price tracking website using Wordpress
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Building Cryptocurrency Price Tracker Website with Wordpress course. This is basically an extensive project based course where you will be guided step by step on how to build a cryptocurrency price tracking website using Wordpress alongside with Cryptocurrency Widgets plugin which is a Wordpress plugin that was specifically designed to create cryptocurrency market price tracker just like Coinmarketcap and Coingecko. In addition, Cryptocurrency Widgets plugin is also supported by CoinGecko API, therefore, the price data that will be displayed on the Wordpress website will be reliable and most up to date data. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of Wordpress and get to know more about Cryptocurrency Widgets which is the plugin that will be utilised in this project. Then, you will also get to know the general overview of the project that we are going to build as well as all features that will be included. Before getting to the main section of the course, you will be guided step by step on how to set up all necessary tools like creating an account on Taste WP which is Wordpress testing platform that we are going to use and also installing the plugin that we need for this project. Once we are ready, you will learn step by step on how to build the crypto price tracker website from scratch, we will go over how to import the price columns and how to change the currency. After the website has been built, we are going to be conducting testing to make sure that the crypto price tracking website has been fully functioning and also easy to use from the user’s perspective. There will be four main testing objectives that will be emphasised in this course, those are functionality testing, user experience testing, compatibility testing, and performance testing. Once the website has been tested and passed all the required criteria, you are going to get to know more about affordable domain and hosting options. Hopefully, this particular section will enable you to make informed decisions about which hosting service you want to use. At the end of the course, you will also learn how to monetise your cryptocurrency price tracking website, we will go over several strategies such as displaying ads, premium ICO, and subscription based model.

This course is a comprehensive and targeted preparation resource designed to assist aspiring machine learning professionals in achieving the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty certification (MLS-C01). Whether you are a machine learning practitioner, developer, or data scientist, this course provides a valuable opportunity to gauge your readiness and refine your skills, ultimately leading to success in earning the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty certification.


Is it possible to take the practice test more than once?

Certainly, you are allowed to attempt each practice test multiple times. Upon completion of the practice test, your final outcome will be displayed. With every attempt, the sequence of questions and answers will be randomized.


Is there a time restriction for the practice tests?

Indeed, each test comes with a time constraint of 120 seconds for each question.


What score is required?

The target achievement threshold for each practice test is to achieve at least 70% correct answers.


Do the questions have explanations?

Yes, all questions have explanations for each answer.


Am I granted access to my responses?

Absolutely, you have the opportunity to review all the answers you submitted and ascertain which ones were correct and which ones were not.


Are the questions updated regularly?

Indeed, the questions are routinely updated to ensure the best learning experience.


Additional Note: It is strongly recommended that you take these exams multiple times until you consistently score 90% or higher on each test. Take the challenge without hesitation and start your journey today. Good luck!

courseDetails.title: Introduction à la logistique Internationale
courseDetails.shortDescription: Découvrir les différentes logistiques ainsi que l'évolution du monde de la logistique internationale
courseDetails.longDescription:
Cours d’introduction à la logistique internationale

Ce cours est conçu pour donner aux étudiants une compréhension approfondie de la logistique internationale. Il couvre divers aspects de la logistique, y compris le commerce international, les flux de commerce et le transport international.

Partie  1: La logistique du commerce international

Dans ce cours, nous explorerons les éléments clés de la logistique du commerce international. Nous aborderons des sujets tels que l’importance de la logistique dans le commerce international, les défis et les opportunités, ainsi que les techniques et stratégies utilisées pour optimiser la logistique dans ce domaine.

Partie  2: Les flux du commerce international

Ce cours traite des différents flux impliqués dans le commerce international. Nous examinerons les flux de biens, d’informations et de finances et comment ces flux sont gérés efficacement pour assurer un commerce international fluide.

Partie  3: La logistique du transport international

Le dernier volet de ce cours se concentre sur la logistique du transport international. Nous discuterons des différents modes de transport utilisés en commerce international, de l’importance de choisir le mode de transport approprié, et des défis logistiques que pose le transport international.

En somme, ce cours offre une introduction complète à la logistique internationale, permettant aux étudiants d’acquérir une compréhension solide de la façon dont les produits sont acheminés efficacement à travers les frontières.

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Operations, Logistics and Lean Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Operations, Logistics and lean management, Operations Management, Logistics Management, Supply Chain management
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master course in Operations, Logistics, and Lean Management

This comprehensive course aims to equip students with a solid understanding of operations management, logistics, and lean principles. Participants will learn how to streamline processes, optimize resources, and eliminate waste to enhance overall efficiency and effectiveness in various industries. The course combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications to prepare students for real-world challenges in the dynamic business environment.

In the fast-paced and ever-evolving business landscape, efficient operations, seamless logistics, and lean management practices are essential pillars for achieving success. These critical components form the backbone of a well-oiled organizational machine, ensuring smooth processes, cost-effectiveness, and optimal resource utilization. In this master course, we will delve into the world of Operations, Logistics, and Lean Management and explore their significance in driving productivity, profitability, and customer satisfaction.

The Importance of a Master Course in Opeartions, Logistics, and Lean Management

  1. Enhanced Employability: Graduates with expertise in operations, logistics, and lean management are highly sought after in a wide range of industries, including manufacturing, healthcare, retail, and transportation. These professionals are equipped to handle complex challenges and drive cost-effective solutions.

  2. Strategic Decision-Making: The course equips students with analytical skills to evaluate data, identify bottlenecks, and devise strategic plans to optimize operations and logistics. Lean management principles aid in making informed decisions to improve processes and eliminate inefficiencies.

  3. Global Perspective: In an increasingly interconnected world, supply chains span the globe. A master's course in this field provides students with insights into global logistics, international trade, and cultural nuances that affect operations and decision-making.

  4. Sustainability: Lean principles go hand in hand with sustainable practices, encouraging students to develop environmentally friendly and socially responsible approaches to business operations.

  5. Continuous Improvement: The journey towards operational excellence never truly ends. Graduates of this course develop a mindset of continuous improvement, staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies to maintain a competitive edge.

Curriculum Highlights

  1. Operations Management Fundamentals: Introduction to key concepts and techniques used in operations management, including process mapping, capacity planning, and quality management.

  2. Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Understanding the end-to-end supply chain process, inventory management, transportation, and distribution strategies.

  3. Lean Principles and Tools: In-depth exploration of lean principles, lean manufacturing, and lean Six Sigma methodologies to minimize waste and improve efficiency.

  4. Data Analytics and Optimization: Leveraging data to make data-driven decisions, using statistical analysis and optimization models to improve processes.

  5. Project Management: Developing essential project management skills to execute process improvement initiatives successfully.

  6. Sustainability and Corporate Social Responsibility: Examining the impact of operations and logistics on the environment and society, and exploring sustainable business practices.

Career Opportunities

A Master Course in Operations, Logistics, and Lean Management opens doors to a plethora of exciting career opportunities:

  1. Supply Chain Manager: Oversee the end-to-end supply chain process, ensuring efficient flow of goods and services.

  2. Operations Analyst: Analyze data to identify areas for improvement and implement strategies to optimize processes.

  3. Lean Consultant: Work with organizations to implement lean principles, reduce waste, and enhance overall efficiency.

  4. Logistics Coordinator: Manage the movement of goods and resources, coordinating with suppliers, distributors, and customers.

  5. Quality Assurance Manager: Implement quality control measures to ensure products meet industry standards and customer expectations.

In the dynamic business environment, successful organizations recognize the importance of operations, logistics, and lean management as crucial components of their growth strategy. By optimizing operations, ensuring smooth logistics, and embracing lean principles, companies can achieve greater efficiency, enhanced customer satisfaction, and sustainable long-term success. Staying attuned to the latest trends and technologies in these domains will allow businesses to stay ahead of the competition and continue delivering value in the years to come.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics:

1. Introduction to Operations Management, Process Analysis and Improvement

2. Lean Management Principles, Supply Chain Management

3. Logistics and Distribution, Lean Six Sigma

4. Continuous Improvement and Kaizen

5. Lean Management Case Studies

courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina ASP.NET Core implementando Microservicios con Angular | Docker |  MongoDB | SQL Server
courseDetails.longDescription:

Docker, Angular, MongoDB y SQL Server

Implementaremos paso a paso un proyecto que te ensenara como crear Aplicaciones empresariales con las herramientas tecnologicas del momento, las mas solicitadas por las empresas!

Si no tienes conocimientos de Angular, te ensenaremos desde cero como crear un proyecto y como integrarlo con un backend Microservice Net.

Crearemos un modelo de seguridad basado en Core Identity para administrar la seguridad por authentication y tambien un modelo authorization  para manejar los roles.

Estos seran algunos de los temas que veras en el curso:

Creacion de Microservicios con ASP.NET  y MongoDB

Creacion de Docker containers para MongoDB

Manejo de seguridad en Microservicios utilizando JWT Json Web Tokens

Creacion de Persistencia utilizando el MongoDBDriver

Implementacion del patron Repository para CRUD en MongoDB

Paginacion usando ASP.NET 5, MongoDB y Angular

Creacion de Microservicios para manejar el Core Identity

Creacion de persistencia utilizando Entity Framework Core

Creacion de container para SQL Server

Implementar Core Identity con SQL Server


Microservices

La arquitectura de microservicios (en inglés, Micro Services Architecture, MSA) es una aproximación para el desarrollo de software que consiste en construir una aplicación como un conjunto de pequeños servicios, los cuales se ejecutan en su propio proceso y se comunican con mecanismos ligeros (normalmente una API de recursos HTTP). Cada servicio se encarga de implementar una funcionalidad completa del negocio. Cada servicio es desplegado de forma independiente y puede estar programado en distintos lenguajes y usar diferentes tecnologías de almacenamiento de datos.1​


Se suele considerar la arquitectura de microservicios como una forma específica de realizar una arquitectura orientada a servicios.2
targetAudiences: Web Developers

courseDetails.shortDescription: Improve your Excel skills, boost your career. Master Microsoft Excel worksheets, functions, formulas & many more.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Microsoft Excel makes decision-making easy for management by enabling users to organize, evaluate, and validate data that is quantitative. Organizations can easily visualize the data with excel spreadsheets. Individuals can also improve their career prospects by learning how to use MS Excel.

This online curated course makes it easy to learn and use MS Excel and organize data using it conveniently. The course helps you walk through the basics and advanced functionalities of Excel. It gives quick hacks to the most common functions used on the platform. It also introduces learners to new ways of data analytics.

Even with little to no prior knowledge, learners will be able to conduct advanced operations on Microsoft Excel spreadsheets by the end of the course. That includes calculations, data analysis, maintenance, creating dynamic reports, and learning advanced Excel formulas.


By the end of the course you'll be writing robust, elegant formulas from scratch, allowing you to:

  • Easily build dynamic tools & Excel dashboards to filter, display and analyze your data.

  • Create your own formula-based Excel formatting rules.

  • Join datasets from multiple sources with XLOOKUP, INDEX & MATCH functions.

  • Manipulate dates, times, text, and arrays.

  • Automate tedious and time-consuming tasks using cell formulas and functions in Excel (no VBA required!).

  • Pull real-time data from APIs directly into Excel (weather, stock quotes, directions, etc.).


We'll dive into a broad range of Excel formulas & functions, including:

  • Lookup/Reference functions.

  • Statistical functions.

  • Formula-based formatting.

  • Date & Time functions.

  • Logical operators.

  • Dynamic Array formulas.

  • Text functions.

  • INDIRECT & HYPERLINK.

  • Web scraping with WEBSERVICE & FILTERXML.
targetAudiences: Excel users who want to learn how to write advanced formulas from scratch.
Anyone hoping to expand their analytics skill set, work efficiently with data, and take their career to a new level.
Students looking for an engaging, hands-on, and highly interactive approach to Excel analytics training.
Excel users looking to build powerful analytical thinking and business intelligence skills.
Anyone looking to pursue a career in analytics, data science or business intelligence.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT: Guía Completa: Aprende sobre ChatGPT 4 y mucho más
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende sobre la inteligencia artificial Chat GPT: Utiliza Chat GPT 4, Midjourney, Bing Chat, Prompts, DALL-E y más
courseDetails.longDescription:
Chat GPT: Una Guía Completa sobre ChatGPT 4 y mucho más" es un curso de inmersión completo en el universo de la inteligencia artificial (IA), que ofrece una exploración práctica y aplicada del sofisticado chatbot ChatGPT 4. Este curso integral te equipará con las habilidades necesarias para aprovechar al máximo la productividad de ChatGPT 4, al mismo tiempo que te ayudará a desarrollar habilidades avanzadas de conversación.

Con este curso de Chat GPT, no solo descubrirás cómo funciona ChatGPT 4, sino que también aprenderás sobre su posición en el contexto más amplio de la IA, junto con innovaciones como BingAI, DALL-E2 de OpenAI y Nvidia Maxine. Te enseñaremos cómo integrar estas poderosas herramientas en tus propios proyectos, permitiéndote crear soluciones personalizadas y efectivas.

Además, exploramos la intersección entre IA y SEO (Optimización de Motores de Búsqueda), brindando técnicas para monetizar tu comprensión de la IA y utilizar esa comprensión para generar tráfico orgánico a tus proyectos. Descubrirás cómo se utiliza la IA para mejorar la transcripción y la accesibilidad en Adobe Podcast, así como cómo aplicar estas técnicas en tus propios proyectos.

Nuestro enfoque educativo se centra en la práctica, con ejercicios y proyectos que te ponen en el centro de la experiencia de aprendizaje (Midjourney) - un término que usamos para describir el proceso de aplicar habilidades de IA en escenarios del mundo real. Ya sea que seas un desarrollador de chatbots, un creativo o un streamer, este curso tiene algo para ti.

La estructura del curso se divide en nueve módulos detallados:

Módulo 1: Introducción a ChatGPT 4: Aprenderás todo sobre el chatbot, desde la creación de una cuenta hasta estrategias avanzadas para utilizar los prompts.

Bienvenida al curso ¿Qué es Chat GPT? Creación de una cuenta en ChatGPT: Paso a paso Explorando la interfaz de ChatGPT Desvelando el potencial de ChatGPT ¿Qué son los prompts? Cómo crear prompts eficientes Lista de prompts (Ebook con prompts) Prompt priming y estrategias avanzadas Descubre ChatGPT Plus: Beneficios y ventajas Entendiendo ChatGPT 4 Cómo acceder a ChatGPT en el celular Errores comunes al utilizar ChatGPT Navegar con Bing: Acceder a la web utilizando la búsqueda de Bing con ChatGPT 4

Módulo 2: ChatGPT para la creación de contenido, redes sociales, guiones de video y SEO: Exploraremos cómo utilizar ChatGPT para optimizar tu contenido y SEO.

Obtener ideas e información para videos con ChatGPT Cómo utilizar ChatGPT para crear guiones de video eficientes Scripts para podcasts con ChatGPT Impulsa el SEO de tu canal de YouTube con ChatGPT Creación de miniaturas virales para tu canal con ChatGPT Cómo crear un carrusel de imágenes para publicaciones con Canva y ChatGPT Creación de narraciones con inteligencia artificial Mejorando la calidad de tu audio con inteligencia artificial NVIDIA Broadcast: Mejorando la calidad del audio y el micrófono Produciendo videos con inteligencia artificial y ChatGPT Mejora la calidad de una imagen con inteligencia artificial

Módulo 3: ChatGPT para negocios y marketing: En este módulo, aprenderás a utilizar ChatGPT para mejorar tus campañas de marketing y el rendimiento de tu negocio.

ChatGPT y copywriting: Creación de textos persuasivos ChatGPT: Para campañas optimizadas en Facebook Ads, Google Ads y más Impulsa el SEO de tu sitio web de negocios con ChatGPT ChatGPT para segmentación y personalización de campañas ChatGPT para email marketing efectivo ChatGPT para atención al cliente: Mejorando la satisfacción del cliente ChatGPT para planificación de negocios: Construyendo planes de negocios eficientes ChatGPT para análisis de sentimientos y opiniones de clientes

Módulo 4: Programación con ChatGPT: Este módulo aborda la programación con ChatGPT, desde la lectura de códigos hasta la creación de un sitio web.

Lectura de códigos de programación Generación de códigos de programación con ChatGPT Correcciones en cualquier lenguaje de programación con ChatGPT Creación de un sitio web con ChatGPT Generación de un sitio con inteligencia artificial Creación de un juego JavaScript HTML con ChatGPT

Módulo 5: Formas de ganar dinero con inteligencia artificial: Este módulo se centra en cómo monetizar tus habilidades de IA.

Copywriting impulsado por inteligencia artificial Crea y vende productos digitales con ChatGPT Canal Dark: Crea contenido exclusivo con ChatGPT e IA Marketing de afiliados con ChatGPT: Aprovecha la IA para aumentar tus comisiones Creador de sitios web con recursos de IA: Construye y vende sitios de alto rendimiento Trabajos freelance con inteligencia artificial Profesional de SEO: Optimización de sitios web con ChatGPT Vende trabajos de diseño generados por inteligencia artificial Crea ebooks con ChatGPT Chatbots inteligentes: Crea y vende soluciones para empresas

Este curso es ideal para cualquier persona que quiera dominar la IA y maximizar su potencial en su trabajo, carrera o proyectos personales. ¡Esperamos verte pronto!

courseDetails.title: Job Search Success: LinkedIn + ChatGPT & Land That Interview
courseDetails.shortDescription: Making LinkedIn Optimization Easier with ChatGPT: Empowering Job Seekers
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a job seeker looking to enhance your LinkedIn profile and increase your chances of getting interview invitations? In today's highly competitive job market, standing out among other applicants can be challenging. Many candidates are competing for the same positions, so you must find ways to outshine the competition.


It's time to face the reality that submitting job applications is insufficient. To truly make an impact, you need an optimized LinkedIn profile that captures the attention of hiring managers and recruiters.


As professional recruiters, we understand job seekers' everyday challenges when enhancing their LinkedIn profiles. Many individuals recognize the importance of having a polished profile but often struggle with the process. They are unsure about what to include in their profile and how to make it interesting and professional. It can be confusing and challenging to know what to have and how to present it in a way that grabs attention.

This course aims to address these challenges by providing tips, examples, and step-by-step guidance to create a standout LinkedIn profile.


You will learn what information to include in each section of your profile and how to showcase your skills, accomplishments, and unique proposition effectively.


Furthermore, we will explore the power of ChatGPT as a valuable tool for optimizing your profile. We provide practical examples that demonstrate how to effectively guide ChatGPT in presenting your information in a compelling and personalized way, irrespective of your technical skills.

Whether crafting compelling LinkedIn profiles, generating outreach messages, or writing effective recommendations, understanding how to provide effective prompts is the key to unlocking ChatGPT's full potential.


Don't let technical knowledge and limitations hold you back. With our guidance, you will gain the confidence to make the most out of ChatGPT and create a standout LinkedIn profile that sets you apart from the competition.


Join us now and boost your visibility in the competitive job market.


Take control of your career and start shaping your future today!
targetAudiences: Anyone who struggles to write their LinkedIn profile
Anyone who wants a LinkedIn profile that stands out but is unsure of how to do it
Job seekers who want to learn strategies and tips to improve their LinkedIn profile to attract potential employers, hiring managers, and recruiters.
Anyone who wants to learn HOW ChatGPT can help improve their LinkedIn profile.
Anyone who wants to know the crucial and essential information to include in their LinkedIn profile catering to their objectives
